titleInfo.title: Ernest Tubb and his Texas Troubadours - Driftwood On The River (with Tommy Paige) / Driftwood On The River (with Billy Byrd) (live radio performances)

mods.abstract: Grand Ole Opry broadcast excerpt of Ernest Tubb and his Texas Troubadours performing Driftwood On The River, with guitarist Tommy Paige; followed by a second, later performance of the same song with guitarist Billy Byrd (not necessarily from an Opry broadcast).

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
